DOC.brief_summary: To observe safety , tolerability immunogenicity administration 3 dos rotateq healthy Indian infant 6 week exactly 12 week age entry .
DOC.brief_title: Safety , Tolerability Immunogenicity Vaccination With Rotateq Healthy Infants India ( V260-021 )
DOC.criteria: Age 6 week exactly 12 week Healthy infant Clinical evidence active gastrointestinal illness Fever , rectal temperature great equal thirty eight degree celsius time immunization History congenital abdominal disorder , intussusception , abdominal surgery History know prior rotavirus disease Known suspect impairment immunological function Prior administration rotavirus vaccine Known hypersensitivity component rotavirus vaccine , e.g . trypsin
